message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $1500000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm not willing to go below $1100000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
